wikipedia_page.main: Ralph Harris (January 31, 1921 – December 24, 2008) was a British journalist and Reuters presidential correspondent.  He was Reuters' official White House correspondent for the presidents from Truman until Reagan.

response: * Ralph Harris, Baron Harris of High Cross (1924–2006), British economist
* Ralph Harris (comedian), American comedian, actor, and writer
* Ralph Harris (journalist), former Reuters White House correspondent
